modShortDescription: This mod removes the snow and desert biomes from the game and adds more forest.
modDescription:
This mod removes the snow and desert [biomes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-biomes/) from the game and adds more forest.

## Details

* Snow and desert are just replaced with the standard pine forest biome.
* Oil shale is added to pine forest biome that replaced desert.
* Can only be used when generating a new world.
* World generation UI is modified so you can see the biomes (colored) properly.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a19/tree/main/Khelldon-GetGreener)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-GetGreener)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khelldon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khelldon/), [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
